meanings.definition: A green or blue mineral consisting of a hydrated calcium aluminum silicate.
meanings.sent1: The zoisite sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Miners found a large vein of zoisite in the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The jeweler joked that the zoisite was so bright, it could light up a room.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone like zoisite, full of life and color.
meanings.sent5: The zoisite gemstone was as vibrant as a meadow in spring.
